code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const OfferSection=()=>{const offers=[{id:1,title:"Tasty Thursdays",discount:"20%",imgSrc:"images/o1.jpg",buttonText:"Order Now"},{id:2,title:"Pizza Days",discount:"15%",imgSrc:"images/o2.jpg",buttonText:"Order Now"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"offer_section layout_padding-bottom",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"offer_container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"row",children:offers.map(offer=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img-box",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:offer.imgSrc,alt:offer.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"detail-box",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:offer.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h6",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:offer.discount})," Off"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/menu",children:offer.buttonText})]})]})},offer.id))})})})});};export default OfferSection;
